items.title: Caya
items.content_html: Caya provides end-to-end document automation for German businesses, handling physical mail digitization, document classification, data extraction, and system integration.

items.title: Hyarchis
items.content_html: Hyarchis provides cloud-based KYC and document processing solutions for financial services, specializing in compliance management and client onboarding automation.

items.title: inovoo
items.content_html: inovoo provides low-code business process automation through its NOVO CxP platform, offering intelligent document processing for healthcare, finance, and government sectors.

items.title: myBiros
items.content_html: myBiros provides cloud-based intelligent document processing for insurance, financial services, and utilities, combining small language models with OCR and computer vision.

items.title: Ondox
items.content_html: Ondox provides AI-powered document processing for insurance, financial services, and government agencies using large language models including OpenAI GPT and Anthropic Claude.

items.title: Pulse
items.content_html: Pulse provides document processing and OCR infrastructure for financial services, healthcare, insurance, and legal sectors through layout-aware vision models.

items.title: ScaleHub
items.content_html: ScaleHub provides document processing combining AI automation with a global network of human contributors for high-volume document extraction.

items.title: Scry AI
items.content_html: Scry AI provides intelligent document processing, conversational AI, and IoT platforms for banking, insurance, real estate, energy, manufacturing, and government sectors.

items.title: LumoDoc by FortoLabs
items.content_html: LumoDoc is an advanced, Agentic AI-powered Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) solution engineered for high-precision data extraction and workflow automation across the global logistics industry.
